title: Seed
description: Sets the item as a seed that can be planted to grow crops. When used on valid ground, the seed will place the specified crop block.

fields.title: Crop Result
fields.description: The block identifier that will be placed when the seed is planted (e.g., 'wheat', 'beetroot', 'cave_vines').

fields.title: Plant At
fields.description: Array of block identifiers that this seed can be planted on or attached to. If not specified, standard farmland rules apply.

fields.title: Plant At Any Solid Surface
fields.description: If true, the seed can be planted on any solid surface, not just farmland or specified blocks. This property was deprecated and removed in versions after 1.18.
fields.note: This property was available in versions 1.16.0 through 1.18.x for items like glow berries, but has been removed in later versions.

fields.title: Plant At Face
fields.description: The face of a block where this seed can be planted. Values: 'UP' for top of blocks (normal crops), 'DOWN' for bottom (hanging plants like glow berries). This property was deprecated and removed in versions after 1.18.
fields.note: This property was available in versions 1.16.0 through 1.18.x for items like glow berries, but has been removed in later versions.
